mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM(ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, HEAD_COUNT, PRICE, CAFE_ID) VALUES (ROOM_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{description}, #{headCount}, #{price}, #{cafeId})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, IMAGE_PATH, HEAD_COUNT, PRICE, STATUS, CAFE_ID FROM ROOM WHERE STATUS = 'enabled' ORDER BY ID ASC
SELECT ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, IMAGE_PATH, HEAD_COUNT, PRICE, STATUS, CAFE_ID FROM ROOM WHERE CAFE_ID = #{id} ORDER BY ID ASC
SELECT ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, IMAGE_PATH, HEAD_COUNT, PRICE, STATUS, CAFE_ID FROM ROOM WHERE ID = #{id}
